summary: Fixed pre-existing TypeScript errors in useLightningAddressPayment.test.ts

fixes_applied.issue: TypeScript error: Property 'message' does not exist on type 'never'
fixes_applied.fix: Changed type annotation from 'Error | null' to 'unknown' and cast when accessing .message

root_causes: TypeScript narrowing: After assigning inside catch block, TS didn't recognize the value was set
